General.Name: Evoke Pharma Inc
General.Description: Evoke Pharma, Inc. operates as a specialty pharmaceutical company that focuses on the development and commercialization of drugs for the treatment of gastroenterological disorders and diseases. It offers Gimoti, a metoclopramide nasal spray to treat symptoms associated with acute and recurrent diabetic gastroparesis in adults. The company markets its products to gastroenterologists, internal medicine specialists, primary care physicians, and select health care providers. Evoke Pharma, Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Solana Beach, California.
General.Address: 420 Stevens Avenue, Solana Beach, CA, United States, 92075
